name: Arachnos_Soldiers.Crab_Spider_Soldier
display_help: Crab Spiders are heavy infantry in the Arachnos Organization, with a wide array of ranged and melee combat skills.

powers.name: Arachnos_Soldiers.Crab_Spider_Soldier.Channelgun
powers.display_help: Your backpack has a built in energy Longfang Channelgun which fires bolts of energy. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

display_info: -7.50% strength to defense for 5s on target

powers.name: Arachnos_Soldiers.Crab_Spider_Soldier.Slice
powers.display_help: The arms of your backpack may be used to slice at opponents for moderate lethal damage, as well as reducing their defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

display_info: -7.50% strength to defense for 6s on target

powers.name: Arachnos_Soldiers.Crab_Spider_Soldier.Longfang
powers.display_help: Your Longfang Channelgun may also fire short bursts, causing greater damage. This attack also reduces your foe's defense. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

display_info: 3 ticks of 30.40 lethal damage over 0.7s on target
-7.50% strength to defense for 5s on target

powers.name: Arachnos_Soldiers.Crab_Spider_Soldier.Aim
powers.display_help: Greatly increases your chance to hit with attacks for a few seconds. Slightly increases damage. Recharge: Long

display_info: 50.00% strength to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 10s on self

powers.name: Arachnos_Soldiers.Crab_Spider_Soldier.Suppression
powers.display_help: Your Longfang Channelgun may also fire long bursts of energy, causing moderate damage in an large cone in front of you. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

display_info.Effect Area: Cone — 50 ft. radius 60° arc (10 targets max)

display_info: 6 ticks of 10.31 energy damage over 3.1s on target
-7.50% strength to defense for 5s on target
6 ticks of 9.84 energy damage over 3.1s on target

powers.name: Arachnos_Soldiers.Crab_Spider_Soldier.Arm_Lash
powers.display_help: The Crab Spider's backpack is capable of making rapid attacks with its many arms dealing heavy damage to foes within a short cone in front of the user. Damage: Heavy, Recharge: Moderate

display_info.Effect Area: Cone — 10 ft. radius 30° arc (5 targets max)

display_info: -7.50% strength to defense for 6s on target

powers.name: Arachnos_Soldiers.Crab_Spider_Soldier.CS_Venom_Grenade
powers.display_help: This poisonous grenade causes toxic damage over time and weakens the resistance of all foes within the area of effect. NOTE: If you take this power you cannot also take the Wolf Spider version. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

display_info: 5 ticks of 10.92 toxic damage over 4.13s on target
-20.00% resistance to smashing damage, lethal damage, fire damage, cold damage, energy damage, negative energy damage, psionic damage, toxic damage for 16s on target
-40.00% resistance to toxic damage for 16s on target
5 ticks of 7.13 toxic damage over 4.13s on target

powers.name: Arachnos_Soldiers.Crab_Spider_Soldier.CS_Frag_Grenade
powers.display_help: Launches an M30 Grenade at long range from an arm of your backpack. The explosion from this grenade affects all within the blast and can knock them back. Note: If you take this power, you cannot take the Wolf Spider version. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow
powers.display_short_help: Ranged(Targeted AoE), Moderate DMG (Lethal/Smash), Foe Knockback

display_info: 50.00% chance for 3.7 magnitude knock on target
50.00% chance for 3.7 magnitude knock on target

powers.name: Arachnos_Soldiers.Crab_Spider_Soldier.Frenzy
powers.display_help: You can energize and lash out with your arms, causing both lethal and energy damage to all foes surrounding you. This attack also weakens the Defense of those struck. Damage: Heavy, Recharge: Slow

display_info: -7.50% strength to defense for 6s on target

powers.name: Arachnos_Soldiers.Crab_Spider_Soldier.Omega_Maneuver
powers.display_help: You may use the Arachnos Teleportation system to summon an Omega Bomb in the midst of your enemies. The Omega Bomb immediately sends out a short range psionic signal and hypnotic light display to draw the attention of those nearby, causing them to approach the device. Then it detonates, causing massive damage to all enemies in a wide radius. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Very Long
powers.display_short_help: Summon Omega Bomb: Ranged (Location Targeted AoE), Superior DMG (Smashing/Energy), Foe Disorient
